text: Rodney is an unincorporated community in Gallia County, in the U.S. state of Ohio. ==History== Rodney was platted in 1830. A post office called Rodney was in operation from 1839 until 1985. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Gallia County, Ohio Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: Rodney, Ohio
